name: Kitchen Cabinet Kings
overview:
Kitchen Cabinet Kings is one of the largest suppliers of cabinetry on the internet. In addition to selling kitchen and bathroom cabinets, we provide wholesale pricing on bathroom vanities, furniture, and tiles as well.

Our Kitchen Cabinet Design staff is extremely knowledgeable with our cabinet line and will be able to design a kitchen layout for you that is both functional and well thought out. We use 20/20 Technologies Design Software to design our kitchens which is the industry leader. This software allows us to transform your measurements into beautiful 3-D renderings of your new kitchen so you can visualize exactly how it will look. Best part about this service, it is completely free with no obligation!

Customer service and support is the engine that drives our business. It is for this reason we have the most extensive live support chat hours in the industry. Our live support technicians are certified kitchen designers available to answer any specific questions about our products and offer design assistance, all at your convenience. We hope to make your online shopping experience a positive one and we look forward to providing you our quality all wood kitchen and bathroom cabinets.
